div.span: The Rocklin Unified School District will remain closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year due to COVID-19. Please visit our "Novel Coronavirus" page for the latest updates and information.

The Rocklin Unified School District has been recognized by the California PBIS (Positive Behavioral Interventions and Supports) Coalition for its outstanding efforts in implementing the multi-tiered system throughout the district! In the video above, the coalition highlights Rocklin Elementary School for utilizing PBIS best practices and RUSD leaders speak on behalf of the program. Check it out to learn more!
